class.name: AbilitySystemAttribute
class.brief_description: Resource defining a singular attribute type.
class.description: [AbilitySystemAttribute] is a data resource that defines the metadata for a gameplay attribute (e.g., Health, Mana, Strength). These resources are automatically scanned by the engine to populate the global attribute registry.

members.member: The unique identifier for this attribute. Used in effects and attribute sets.
